Text: However, as per the policy announced in 2015, the energy generation capacity of such solar project must be less than 50 per cent of their sanction load.
Cause: However, as per the policy announced in 2015
Effect: the energy generation capacity of such solar project must be less than 50 per cent of their sanction load.
Sentence: <e1>However, as per the policy announced in 2015</e1>, <e2>the energy generation capacity of such solar project must be less than 50 per cent of their sanction load.</e2>
